resp = client.bulk(
    index="logs",
    refresh=True,
    operations=[
        {
            "index": {
                "_id": 1
            }
        },
        {
            "body": "warning: page could not be rendered"
        },
        {
            "index": {
                "_id": 2
            }
        },
        {
            "body": "authentication error"
        },
        {
            "index": {
                "_id": 3
            }
        },
        {
            "body": "warning: connection timed out"
        }
    ],
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.search(
    index="logs",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "messages": {
            "filters": {
                "filters": {
                    "errors": {
                        "match": {
                            "body": "error"
                        }
                    },
                    "warnings": {
                        "match": {
                            "body": "warning"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp1)
